themeOneFeatureSection.heading: What Makes Repic Different?
themeOneFeatureSection.headingText: Repic simplifies real estate investments with smarter decisions and time-saving technology.

featureData.title: Unlimited Portfolio Management
featureData.text: Track properties, manage income and expenses, and stay organized in one app.

featureData.title: AI-Powered Investment Insights
featureData.text: Get tailored answers and strategies with Repic's cutting-edge AI.

featureData.title: Distraction-Free Experience
featureData.text: Focus on investments with ads-free, professional tools.

themeOneServiceSection.heading: Smarter Real Estate Decisions at Your Fingertips

serviceData.text: Start using Repic instantly with guest access—no account required.
Access free tools or upgrade to premium for unlimited features.
Enjoy advanced encryption to keep your data secure.
Track cash flow, ROI, and cap rates with ease.

themeOneWorkSection.heading: How Repic Works?
themeOneWorkSection.headingText: Get started in minutes and make smarter real estate decisions.

workData.title: Install the App
workData.content: Download Repic from the App Store or Google Play and start exploring.

workData.title: Setup Your Profile
workData.content: Create an account or use guest access to get started instantly.

workData.title: Start Analyzing
workData.content: Add property details and let Repic calculate cash flow, ROI, and cap rates.

themeOnePricingSection.heading: Unlock Full Power Of Repic
themeOnePricingSection.headingText: Choose a plan that fits your real estate goals—start with a 7-day free trial.
